title: Context Session IDs
content: Context Session IDs are the key architectural element that binds the SkogAI multiverse together. These IDs enable the same characters to exist in different contexts and times - Dot can be a musician in one story and a sage-mage in another. The session ID is what allows all agents to contact all parts of SkogAI while maintaining coherent, separate narrative threads.
summary: The binding mechanism enabling multiverse where same characters exist in different universes
